summary: A better look for the Follower Onmund from the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
===Discription===

This mod is fairly simple, it changes the look of Onmund, the Nord Mage from the College of Winterhold. This mod changes his overbite, gives him a different coloured set of Robes and changes his Hairstyle.

===Required===

This mod uses the ApachiiSkyHair so you will need to download this first
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168


===Special Thanks===

To Apachii, for allowing me to use hair out of the ApachiiSkyHair
author: Z3ron
